title: Measuring Temperature in Water
description: An illustration showing a hand holding a digital thermometer, which is being submerged in a glass of water. The thermometer displays a digital reading, indicating it is measuring the temperature of the water.

title: Digital Thermometer with Cleaning Instructions
description: An illustration showing a digital thermometer at the top with a display screen and a blue tip. Below it, there is an arrow pointing down to a cotton swab or cloth, indicating the action of cleaning the thermometer.

title: Using a Hair Dryer on Toothpaste
description: An illustration showing a hand holding a red hair dryer directed towards a toothbrush with a small amount of toothpaste on it, placed on a wooden surface. The hair dryer is aimed at the toothpaste, suggesting a method to warm or dry it.
